title.rendered: Gold Coast Flower Delivery | Best Online Florist

content.rendered:
Seasonal florals,
designed with love.

SHOP FRESH FLOWERS

Seasonal florals,
designed with love.

SHOP FRESH FLOWERS
SHOP FRESH FLOWERS
 

STORE

 

LULLY & ROSE florist, nestled in the heart of the Gold Coast, a perfumed haven of premium flowers, indoor plants & thoughtfully curated Australian gift hampers.

 

With over 11 years of industry experience, we work closely with Queensland flower wholesalers and micro growers throughout the Gold Coast Hinterland and the Northern NSW region, to source the freshest and highest quality, where every flower is personally hand-selected by us, and lovingly designed by owner and lead floral designer, Rachael. We offer same day Gold Coast flower delivery, delivered by our specialised couriers to ensure your florals are handled with love and delivered with care.

 

FIND OUT MORE

SELECTED BY THE PEOPLE

Our most popular flower arrangements, indoor plants and gifts.

EXPLORE OUR RANGE

 

Designer Bouquets

$135.00 – $280.00 incl GST

"Designer Bouquets | White & Pink Roses, Stock, Delphinium | Peach & Lemon Roses, Orchids, Daffodils | Burgundy Roses, Dahlias | Gold Coast Flower Delivery

Signature Posies

$115.00 – $260.00 incl GST

 

Send Love & Hugs

$115.00 incl GST

Send Love & Hugs with our delightful seasonal bouquet of fresh flowers and decadent Loco Love chocolates. Whether it’s a birthday, anniversary, or just to show you care, this floral bouquet is the perfect way to express your affection and bring smiles to those you cherish. Each bouquet is carefully curated to highlight the finest...

Phally Love Hamper

$225.00 incl GST

 

EXPLORE OUR RANGE

EVENTS

Even the most intimate events deserve florals, styled with LULLY & ROSE seasonal and romantic signature design.


Our dedication lies in sourcing the finest seasonal florals to curate unique arrangements that elevate the aesthetics of your event through their exquisite hues. Whether it’s for
corporate gatherings, birthdays, bridal showers, or baby showers, our flowers perfectly complement each occasion. We offer same-day Gold Coast flower delivery, handled by our specialised couriers to ensure your florals arrive fresh for your event.

ENQUIRE HERE

OUR COLLECTION

Shop our collection.

SHOP NOW

Fresh Flowers

En masse – Minimalist design

Gift Hampers

Gifts

Indoor Plants

SHOP NOW

 

CUSTOMER TESTIMONIALS


CUSTOMER TESTIMONIALS

★★★★★

“Beyond impressed.
I am a florist in Adelaide and trusted Lully & Rose for Gold Coast flower delivery to my Mum, my Nana and several customers that want to send interstate from then on. Personal experience will always win and I trust them and their attention to detail, quality and care.
Each time I only hear positive and “above and beyond” comments – we can actually see the time taken in each process of the flower order and delivery.
Thank you so much.”

Ashleigh A | Google

★★★★★

 

“I’ve bought flowers from a lot of different flower shops on the Gold Coast for delivery and I have found the flowers from Lully & Rose have been the freshest.
Beautiful fresh flower bouquets, stunning arrangements and timely flower delivery. Their Loco Love chocolate gift box is absolutely divine.”

Kevin B | Google

★★★★★

 

“Beautiful flowers and prompt delivery, will definitely shop here again! Rachael is a delight, and very talented.”

Ashleigh M | Google

★★★★★

 

“So happy to have discovered this florist. Rachael is so passionate about flowers and she helped me decide on the best floral arrangement to send to my friend.
My friend said the flowers are very fresh and the arrangement was just so beautiful.
Thank you very much Rachael.”

Belinda M | Google

★★★★★

 

“I ordered through Lully & Rose Floral Studio late in the afternoon and my flowers were delivered by 10am the very next morning.
Exceptional service & prompt flower delivery! My girlfriend loved her birthday flowers. Lully & Rose exceeded my expectations.
Highly recommend for anyone looking for a Gold Coast flower delivery.”

Kasey U | Google

★★★★★

 

“I bought flowers from Lully & Rose for my girlfriend’s baby shower.
The flowers were well beyond my expectations, so fresh and beautiful.
I found their flower service to be very personalised. I highly recommend them. Thanks Lully & Rose.”

Team Klilk | Google

★★★★★

 

“The most beautiful valentine’s day flowers delivered to my special friend, beyond thrilled! Fast, friendly and professional flower delivery service, highly recommended!
She loved the pink and red roses! Thank you so much!”

Julie P | Google

★★★★★

 

“Lully & Rose Floral Studio are fantastic, their website is so easy to order flowers online and they are very helpful in explaining arrangements.
The quality of the flowers are amazing and last longer than other flower bouquets I have brought.” 

Brad R | Google

★★★★★

 

“Rachael from Lully & Rose could not be more helpful in regards to suppling flowers for our event in the Gold Coast.
The company I work for is Japanese and we had a special request for Cherry Blossoms and Rachael hunted all over the Gold Coast to supply the Cherry Blossoms and they were magnificent.
Rachael was very clear in her communications and I could not recommend them highly enough. FUJITSU AUSTRALIA.”

Lisa W | Google

★★★★★

 

“The most amazing customer service which made the task of sending my friend flowers worthy of her 50th birthdy that much more enjoyable.
My friend commented that they were stunning and the colours were gorgeous, so your suggestion was better than my intentions.
I will definitely be ordering flowers again from you and I believe my friend will also.“

Carlie W | Google

 

★★★★★

 

“Thank you for your care and attention in helping me select a gift for my clients. The flowers looked pristine and fresh with unique foliage.
It is always a bit of a gable when trying out a new supplier but I’m so pleased I found you. I’ve saved your details for the next time I need beautiful flowers and a gift sent to the Gold Coast. Thank you!“

Mel T | Google

 

★★★★★

 

“Such passionate florists! You can tell they put a lot of love and attention in to every single flower arrangement they make.
Quality flowers and excellent customer service, I’ll never go elsewhere now!”

Jasmine H | Google

★★★★★

 

“Purchased standard size and it was perfect, generously portioned with fresh, high quality flowers. It’s always a risk when you buy from a new flower shop from interstate as you’re not sure how they will turn up – I’ve had some soggy and almost dead bunches delivered to family in my time! I’ve been through almost every flower shop on the Gold Coast buying flowers for my mum and this one might be a new favourite! Thank you x”

Avara W | Google

★★★★★

 

“I can’t rave enough! What an exquisite find this shop is! I live in NZ and was wanting a very special bouquet of flowers for a very dear friend’s significant birthday. Phoned Rachael to discuss options to include my friend’s specific favourite flower, peonies. Rachael went above and beyond what I could only wish for. Exceptional service from my initial query, easy ordering online and then personal delivery. Exceptional bouquet of flowers, I am a Lully and Rose convert!”

Maria Z | Google

★★★★★

 

“I had an exceptional experience with this florist! Their customer service is truly amazing, and the quality of their products exceeded my expectations. The team’s willingness to go above and beyond for their customers is outstanding. I highly recommend for anyone seeking top-notch service and beautiful blooms!”

Thank you Lully & Rose ”

Ashi P | Google

★★★★★

 

“I recently purchased the most stunning flowers from Lully & Rose, for a flower delivery to my Mum on the Gold Coast for Mother’s Day.
Their website is not only elegant and easy to navigate but also has a lovely selection of flower arrangements.
The flowers arrived fresh and beautiful, and I even received confirmation once the flowers had been delivered.
If you are wanting the best fresh flowers delivered on the Golf Coast, I highly recommend them!”

Shannon S | Google

★★★★★

 

“Highly recommend Lully & Rose for anyone looking to send flowers locally on the Gold Coast.
I ordered some flowers very last minute, due to the reason for sending flowers, and Rach was very accomodating and able to get the arrangement sent off the very next morning.
I honestly don’t know which is better, the service or the beautiful arrangement! ”

Cathy L | Google

★★★★★

 

“I want to say a huge thank you to Rachael owner of Lully & Rose. I cant thank you enough for the most beautiful sympathy flowers you sent on my behalf to my family in Australia when my father passed away.
Not only were you amazing to deal with at such a sad and difficult time, but you went above and beyond to ensure the flowers arrived on time and were exactly what I wanted.
Thank you doesnt seem enough Rachael because they were just perfect and more beautiful than I could have imagined and they lasted a very long time.
I have a few family special occasions coming up soon so will definitely be using your wonderful services again 🙂
You are a true professional with an incredible talent and I will be recommending Lully & Rose to everyone I know.”

Jackie B | Google

Flower Delivery Gold Coast
